    Lesson 7: Simulation Diagnostics

    Source: vignettes/lesson_7.Rmd
    lesson_7.Rmd

    Lesson 7: Simulation Diagnostics

    Register for Lesson 7 Webinar

    In Lesson 7, we will perform simulation using the baseModel developed in our previous lesson. You will learn how to specify desired simulation output tables, define applicable engine settings, and execute the simulation using the simmodel() function in Certara.RsNLME. We will then post-process the simulation results and create diagnostic plots to evaluate our output using ggplot2.




    Live Webinar Date: 10/26/2022 @10am EST

    In the webinar we will cover the following topics:

    • Define desired simulation output table with appropriate variables and time sequences
    • Specify correct engine parameters for simulation
    • Use the simmodel() function to execute simulation
    • Post-process simulation results and create diagnostic plots
